      • awaitState

        public static boolean awaitState(Job job,
                                 Job.State state,
                                 long timeout,
                                 java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        Wait for the job to reach the specified state.

        A placeholder till GraphJob directly supports awaitState()?

        Parameters:
        job -
        state -
        timeout - specify -1 to wait forever (until interrupted)
        unit - may be null if timeout is -1
        Returns:
        true if the state was reached, false otherwise: the time limit was reached of the thread was interrupted.
